name: pflow-xyz
description: Interactive web component for authoring, visualizing and simulating Petri nets. Exposes a JSON‑LD model, supports pan/zoom, editing (Ace optional), import/export, autosave and local persistence.
keywords: petri nets, web component, json-ld, visualization, simulation, editor, ace, pan, zoom, autosave
featureList: Model persisted as JSON‑LD and editable via embedded/ace JSON editor
Simulation mode with transition firing and state updates
Pan/zoom with scale meter and responsive canvas
Import/export and download of stable, sorted JSON
